Are there still packages missing?

Does 3.2 start under AIX 5.3?

Felipe, you've seen this font thing before, right?

Well, the problem ist solved. Reason was the Reflection X Window Server that we use on our PCs. Eclipse obviously sends some requests to the X server to find out the default font. This seems not to be set the way Eclipse expects it. Using Exceed in xdm mode works fine.

Jochen

Sorry I didn't follow up on comment 8 sooner.  Something like this has been reported in the past for Reflection X users remoting to solaris as well, see the comments starting at https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=33828#c14.  I'm glad this is now working for you.
GG, shouldn't we make a FAQ about this?
*** Bug 115979 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
